events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit as expected and I am quite disappointed.
The customer's request regarding a return and refund has been categorized under the Refund cluster for further handling.
A customer service representative has been assigned to address the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the jacket did not fit well. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can check the details and initiate the refund properly?
Sure, my order number is 789654123, and the jacket is too small even though I followed the size chart carefully.
Thank you for the info. I have processed your refund request. You will receive an email with return instructions shortly, and once we get the jacket back, the full amount will be refunded.
Thanks for your quick help! I appreciate the clear instructions and fast refund process. Looking forward to the email.
We confirm that your refund was successfully processed and the amount has been credited back to your payment method.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
This case is now closed as the customer has confirmed receipt of the refund and no further assistance is required. Thank you for contacting support.
